vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.19;
son of: Hebron (H2275B);
brother of: Amariah (H0568I), Jahaziel (H3166I) and Jekameam (H3360)
§ Jerijah or Jeriah = " taught by Jehovah"
a Kohathite Levite and chief of the house of Hebron when David organised the service
vocabinfos._es_Definition: levita; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶利雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華所教導的"
一名哥轄的利未人, 在大衛王安排事奉的工作時, 他是希伯崙家族的首領
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶利雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华所教导的"
一名哥辖的利未人, 在大卫王安排事奉的工作时, 他是希伯仑家族的首领

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.31
§ Jerijah or Jeriah = " taught by Jehovah"
a Kohathite Levite and chief of the house of Hebron when David organised the service
